result.eng: I was cutting wood all morning.

result.eng: It will be cold tomorrow morning.

result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: I listen to the radio in the morning.

result.eng: She runs in the park every morning.

result.eng: He buys a newspaper every morning.

result.eng: I got up at eight in the morning.

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.eng: Put this ointment on your hand each morning and each night.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: I remember waking up Sunday morning, crying.
